short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Toggle dark mode on and off for any webpage.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Dark Mode Toggle is a lightweight and intuitive Chrome extension that lets you easily switch between dark and light mode on any webpage. With a single click, you can enhance your browsing experience by reducing eye strain, especially in low-light conditions. The extension works across all websites, providing a seamless way to customize the appearance of your web content. It instantly switches between modes, saving your preference for a consistent experience as you browse. Whether you're browsing late at night or simply prefer a darker aesthetic, Dark Mode Toggle makes it easy to personalize your web experience.
